actions.text: Proposed amendment SA 1349 withdrawn in Senate.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

Amendment SA 1349 proposed by Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S8802-8803; text: CR S8802-8803) To facilitate the availability of child care for the children of members of the Armed Forces on active duty in connection with Operation Enduring Freedom or Operation Iraqi Freedom and to assist school districts serving large numbers or percentages of military dependent children affected by the war in Iraq or Afghanistan, or by other Department of Defense personnel decisions.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1349 proposed by Senator Murray.

purpose: To facilitate the availability of child care for the children of members of the Armed Forces on active duty in connection with Operation Enduring Freedom or Operation Iraqi Freedom and to assist school districts serving large numbers or percentages of military dependent children affected by the war in Iraq or Afghanistan, or by other Department of Defense personnel decisions.
